column1: Previously on Terrance & Phillip: Terrance farted on the American president, but Phillip took the heat.
And now, the thrilling conclusion of... Terrance & Phillip: Blood Rage
Available at South Park Mall staring Black Friday.
For the next round, it is Gadnuk, Breaker of Worlds, versus Clucky
Now, get ready for Canada's hottest action stars,  Terrance and Phillip in HBC's Movie of the Week:  Not Without My Anus. Based on a true story.
Previously, on South Park: an air of sobriety fills the laboratory as the men of South Park gather to find out which one of them fathered this boy.
It's time for the Terrance & Phillip Show!
